programme.title: Pup Star: Better 2Gether
programme.desc: Pup Star is back for an all-new adventure! After winning the canine competition show Pup Star and becoming an international pup sensation, Tiny, the adorable Yorkie, has her world turned upside down when an evil rival switches her out in competition with a street pup named Scrappy. The two pups find themselves living the others' very different life and an incredible journey through iconic cities ensues in this fun and hilarious dog-out-of-water adventure!

programme.title: Love Wrecked
programme.desc: Jenny Taylor (Amanda Bynes) has found her ideal man who she just knows would sweep her off her feet. The only problem? He's Jason Masters (Chris Carmack), the world's biggest rock star. Hoping for a chance to get close to her idol, Jenny takes a job in his favourite Caribbean resort with her best friend Ryan (Jonathan Bennett). When Jason is washed overboard in a storm, Jenny jumps in to save him and the pair find themselves stranded on a seemingly-deserted tropical island.

programme.title: MXP: Most Xtreme Primate
programme.desc: After an exciting career playing professional hockey and busting tricks with the world’s best skateboarders, Jack is back at the El Simian nature preserve. Jack likes hanging around but soon he grows tired of life at the preserve. Trying to liven things up, Julie, the caretaker, organizes a family vacation to Mexico. But then, Jack gets separated from the group and ends up on the wrong plane to Colorado!! Lost and confused, Jack meets up with Pete, a snowboarder, and his rocker brother Jay, who try to help Jack find his family.

programme.title: Swiped
programme.desc: A womanising college student (Noah Centineo) enlists his nerdy roommate (Kendall Sanders) to code the ultimate hook up app by offering to pay his tuition for MIT but unexpected consequences ensue.

programme.title: Couples Vacation
programme.desc: With his marriage and career against the ropes, dejected author Jack Spencer travels with his wife, Amanda, to an isolated glamping retreat in search of a spark. When a surprise double booking finds their private retreat anything but private, Jack spins into a comedic exploration of love, lost dreams, small-town-wisdom, and friendship with a miniature donkey to get over himself before he loses all he holds dear.

programme.title: The Truth About
programme.desc: Today we are going to meet the coaches. These men and women have one goal in mind: to lead an athlete or an entire team to victory. And if you think that standing on the side-lines barking orders is a job for the timid, think again. Because to win a cup or a trophy, you have to be able to keep calm when you are under pressure. But that's not all. A good coach can turn their experience as a player into coaching skills or even succeed without any experience in a big team. Finally, whatever their fate, they support their team whether in victory or in defeat. Some are very much in the public eye, others are unobtrusive, but none of them can hide the truth.

programme.title: Hollywood Weapons: Fact or Fiction?
programme.desc: In this classic western, Clint Eastwood – aka “Blondie” – saves Eli Wallach from the hangman’s noose three separate times by shooting and severing the rope that he hangs from. We recreate each scene and test the reality of these shots with the weapons that were used.

programme.title: Hollywood Weapons: Fact or Fiction?
programme.desc: John McLain (Bruce Willis) finds himself dangling from the side of a building. The only way to save himself is to shoot through the glass window and break through to safety. Using the same Beretta 92 handgun, we reconstruct the office glass and see if our host can break through.

programme.title: Xploration Awesome Planet
programme.desc: In this episode, Philippe Cousteau Jr., grandson of legendary explorer Jacques Cousteau, explores the different ways an environmental painter, sculptor, photographer and craftsman blend nature with art.

programme.title: Xploration Awesome Planet
programme.desc: In this episode, Cousteau dives off the coast of Australia to explore the Great Barrier Reef. He then heads to James Cook University to get an up-close look at some of the country’s deadliest creatures and visits the National Sea Simulator.

programme.title: Xploration Awesome Planet
programme.desc: In this episode, Cousteau travels to New Zealand, where he explores Auckland’s volcanic field and comes face-to-face with one of the largest insects on the planet. We then head to the South Island for a breathtaking helicopter ride.

programme.title: Xploration Awesome Planet
programme.desc: In this episode, Cousteau heads to Hawaii to see an incredibly rare waterfall of lava pouring into the ocean. We’ll then visit the Antelope Canyon of Arizona, walk atop a unique frozen lake in Alberta, and take a magical scuba dive in Mexico.

programme.title: Xploration Awesome Planet
programme.desc: In this episode, we reveal the winner of our first ever #StudentExplorer Contest. Philippe and the lucky student then head to Mexico to swim with whale sharks in the wild.

programme.title: Xploration Awesome Planet
programme.desc: In this episode, we unearthsome of the ways scientists, students and regular citizens are working to save our Earth. From creating “safe havens” for New Zealand’s endangered species, to breeding clownfish in Australia.

programme.title: Xploration Awesome Planet
programme.desc: In this episode, Philippe travels to Pennsylvania to explore a hidden wonder beneath the Appalachian Mountains and see how researchers at Carnegie Mellon University are using cutting-edge science to measure air quality in Pittsburgh.

programme.title: Xploration Awesome Planet
programme.desc: In this episode, we’ll travel to Yellowstone National Park to learn how rescue dogs can find people caught in an avalanche. From there trips to Hawaii and Utah will see how rangers keep visitors safe from dangerous conditions.

programme.title: Xploration Awesome Planet
programme.desc: In this episode, we visit Pennsylvania to see how engineers are using new technology to fast-track the replacement of more than 500 bridges. Then it’s off to New Orleans for a look at the city’s $1.1 billion dollar hurricane protection facility.

programme.title: Xploration Awesome Planet
programme.desc: In this episode, Cousteau will travel to Australia to catch the world’s deadliest jellyfish. We’ll also visit California to see how after years on the brink of extinction the California Condor continues to slowly recover.

programme.title: Uae Warriors 14
programme.desc: UAE Warriors 14 took place on Friday 27th November 2020 from Abu Dhabi, Dubai. In the nights main event, Argentina's Gabriela Campo took on France's Manon "The Beast" Fiorot for the women's flyweight title. Gold was also on the line in the co-main event, where Canada's Xavier "The Breadman" Alaoui met Jaures "Crazy Cameroonian" Dea for the bantamweight title, using their impressive Judo skills upon one another in a battle for victory.

programme.title: Fantastic Finishes

programme.title: A Champion's Journey
programme.desc: 5 fights, 2 fights in one night, the winner gets a million dollars. This is a champions journey to $1 Million Dollars and a look at the toughest tournament in modern day sports.

programme.title: The Randy Couture Story
programme.desc: They called him captain America. This is the story of one of the most inspirational athletes in the world and how he became a 2 time UFC champion and a pioneer in mixed martial arts.

programme.title: Under The Lights - Pele
programme.desc: "How do you spell Pele? G-O-D", and that's because Pele is much more than a man, he had the gift of ubiquity on the field, he was a natural force, who became a national sentiment and a universal legend. The immeasurable titan of sports was born in Brazil, the Colossus of the South, on October 23, 1940, in the city of Tres Corais, in the south of the state of Minas Gerais. The child was baptized Edson Arantes do Nascimento, as his father chose his first name in honour of the scientist Thomas Edison. For his mother, he was simply Dico, but for history: Pele.

programme.title: Collectables Guru
programme.desc: Gary presents a unique collection of football memorabilia explaining the background to its ownership. All items are available to buy via his website or phone.

programme.title: FIA European Karting Championships
programme.desc: The technical difficulties of this demanding track were once again on display as the driver navigated its unique points. Another hotly contested race weekdend with plenty of race incidents.

programme.title: FIA European Karting Championships
programme.desc: The first round of the FIA gearbox season brings the paddock to Germany on the famous Prokart Raceland circuit in Wackersdorf. It's the perfect setting for the KZ and KZ2 categories to commence their fight for the European title. Plus we see the return of the FIA Karting Academy Trophy with 48 drivers from around the world.

programme.title: Inside Chinese Football
programme.desc: Chinese football is in dire straits to the great despair of the country fans but not for lack of money since local clubs lavish outrageous amounts of money to attract foreign players and coaches. So why can’t China enjoy the same success in football as in other sports? To solve this enigma you need a total immersion into the strange and somewhat surrealist world of Chinese football. This provocative film goes beyond the strict sports analysis. It is an illustration of the shortcomings of a system not used to give such an image of failure to the rest of the world.

programme.title: Carp Wars 2: Coe vs Morris
programme.desc: Steven Coe, this year's wildcard entry, has only managed to score 2 points in the competition so far, and in Carp Wars there are no easy matches. His opponent this time around is fresh off the back of a breathtaking victory over Ian Russell is Lee 'Mozza' Morris. Who will win?

programme.title: Carp Wars 2 - Russell vs Levy
programme.desc: Episode 11 sees Dave 'The General' Levy and Ian Russell locked in a top-of-the-table battle. Can Ian bounce back after his defeat to Mozza in their epic encounter? Dave's been quietly accumulating points steadily throughout the competition. Whoever wins this will open up a gap at the top of the leaderboard.

programme.title: Carp Wars 2 - The Eliminator

Join us as amateur anglers Luke Gilvrey, Steven Coe, Cafer Gunay and Mitchell Massey slug it out in an epic 8 hour carp fishing battle.

programme.title: Draw
programme.desc: In home, stadiums, offices and pubs around the world, there is an ongoing generational debate over whose country had the best sports era. programme.title: Saving Warru
programme.desc: Warru, or black-footed rock-wallaby, is one of South Australia's most endangered mammals. In 2007, when numbers dropped below 200 in the remote north-west of the State, the Warru Recovery Team was formed to help save the precious species from extinction. Bringing together contemporary science, practical on-ground threat management and traditional Anangu ecological knowledge, this unique decade-long program has recently celebrated the release of dozens of warru to the wild for the first time.

programme.title: Shifting Ice + Changing Tides
programme.desc: ‘Shifting Ice and Changing Tides’ is a human and wind powered, female led, ski and sail expedition to the west coast of Greenland. In this remote, fascinating and beautiful region, six women will explore and ski first descents while limiting their environmental footprint by sailing and climbing.

programme.title: Wonder Women S1E1 India
programme.desc: In India, the Dalit are the lowest caste in the social order, and girls are especially vulnerable to mistreatment, but a group of young women from the city of Dindigul are breaking tradition by becoming the first female performers in a drumming competition.

programme.title: Ancient Grains - Amaranth
programme.desc: When you open your pantry, do images of the rugged mountains of South America, the colorful tablelands of Africa and the fertile river valleys of the Middle East dance before your eyes? If not, you have yet to discover amaranth, quinoa, spelt, kamut and teff, the quintet of nutritional powerhouses known as the ancient grains. The legends behind their origins many millennia past, their loss over time and their ultimate modern revival - literally tell the story of civilization.

programme.title: Black Sunday
programme.desc: A detailed report of the Holocaust in Romania. During World War II, two trains were loaded with Jews. Where they will be taken? To their deaths. Four survivors of Romanian Holocaust tell us what happened in Iasi during the Pogrom, a horror which took place on June 29, 1941. Over 13,000 people died in that single day, a day which has become known as Black Sunday in remembrance of those who lost their lives.

programme.title: Wadjemup : Black Prison White Playground
programme.desc: Black Prison White Playground. Wadjemup/Rottnest Island. A beautiful place that is culturally and spiritually significant to Aboriginal people. And also a site where gross harm took place and hundreds of Aboriginal men are buried in unmarked graves.

programme.title: Letters to our Children: Stories of Refuge
programme.desc: A group of immigrant and refugee mothers from 10 different countries and speaking different languages create a book of illustrations showcasing heartfelt letters to their children as a way to explain what brought them to Winnipeg, Canada and what they hope their lives will be like. This film follows the women’s incredible journey as they find a way to pass their stories to their children.

programme.title: Only Me Generation
programme.desc: Has China’s ‘one child policy’ really created a generation of spoilt, privileged, selfish young adults? This documentary is a brave expose of what everyday life is like for the ‘Only Me’ generation in China. For the first time on camera, these young Chinese will speak candidly of the huge pressure and high expectations from their parents and reveal the dreams, worries, hopes and fears of a generation.

programme.title: The Secrets of La Roja – World Champions 2010
programme.desc: On the 11th July 2010, Spain’s national team reached its goal of winning the World Cup, a victory that was felt by the team and nation as a whole. Despite this successful ending, “La Roja” had to overcome various struggles and difficulties in order to become legendary. The team arrived in South Africa with the triumph of the 2008 European Football Championship under their belt and Vicente del Bosque leading the way. There was a general feeling of favoritism attributed to ""La Roja"" and while the defeat against Switzerland in the first match came as a shock, it motivated Del Bosque and his team to come together and focus on one intention: good football and one goal: to make history.

programme.title: Made in Senegal
programme.desc: Made in Senegal is a story about will, dreams, determination, faith, rebellion, courage and love. The film invites us on a journey through Sadio´s different and highly diverse worlds - from the rural life in a small village in the far south of Senegal to the spotlight of world football by playing for Liverpool FC, even winning the Champions Leagues as number 10 with the world watching… The interaction of animations, documentary scenes, a diverse set of in-depth interviews and archive footage brings Sadio´s past to life and creates an exciting and emotional plot.

programme.title: Inside Kilian Jornet
programme.desc: For Kilian Jornet, the world's greatest mountain athlete, the arrival of his thirties coincided with the best and worst year of his life. This documentary follows Jornet through an intense 10-day tour of 10 cities around the world, allowing the public to see, for the first time, everything that goes on around the professional athlete, and revealing his lesser-known, uninhibited side. Between presentations, interviews, and brand commitments, and with only a few hours' sleep, the athlete reflects on a year marked by injuries his search for the balance between competition and personal projects and the arrival of his first daughter.

programme.title: Eighteam
programme.desc: The Chipolopolo is the Zambia national team that at the 1988 Olympic thrashes Italy 4-0 and has their eyes on the Africa Cup of Nations. But in 1993 a Zambian Air Force ditches into the ocean about 500 metres offshore from Gabon. All passengers, including 18 players, die in the accident.The Chipolopolo's captain, Kalusha Bwalya, who is not aboard the ill-fated flight puts his efforts to build a new team and make a professional federation becoming later the national team coach and president of the Football Association of Zambia. Two decades later, destiny makes Zambia a blink: in Gabon, Zambia becomes African champions for the first time after a long penalty shoot-out. There are 18 penalties.

programme.title: Matchday - Episode 6: European Night
programme.desc: The season comes to a climax with the Champions League. The semifinal against Liverpool is another night to remember at Camp Nou. Valverde and his men are at the training grounds preparing for the meeting. The game doesn’t disappoint and Barça leave satisfied after a great goal by Leo Messi.

programme.title: Matchday - Episode 7: The 18-Day Storm
programme.desc: With the outcome of the League almost decided, FC Barcelona face the final stages of an unforgettable season. But expectations are transformed into a bitter disappointment in the 18 days between the second leg of the Champions League semifinals and the final of the Copa del Rey. The outcomes of these games leave a bad taste in the mouths of the team and fans.

programme.title: Matchday - Episode 8: A New Beginning
programme.desc: After celebrating their League victory at Camp Nou, the disappointment caused by the defeats at Anfield and at the Copa del Rey test the strength of FC Barcelona. But this is sport, and the motto “more than a club” forces the team and the fans to get up and fight again for the next season. Young blood from La Masia like Carles's Aleñà and new exciting signings like Frenkie de Jong and Antoine Griezmann give the team renewed hope.

programme.title: Andrés Iniesta, The Unexpected Hero
programme.desc: This is the story of a normal person who does extraordinary things. Someone who pursues and achieves triumphs through taking care of the small details, because these are, after all, the ones that make him a different soccer player. We all know the Iniesta-magician of the ball, who conquered two triplets with Barça and raised the World Champion Cup with the Spanish National Team. And yes, of course we know their great sporting moments. But who is behind this global sport superstar? Through exceptional witnesses such as Leo Messi, Neymar Jr., Pep Guardiola, Sergio Ramos, Luis Enrique and a long etc.

programme.title: Anything is Possible
programme.desc: Serge Ibaka grew up poor and at times homeless in the streets of Brazzaville. His mom died when he was 7. His dad was in prison when he was 12. Despite these overwhelming obstaces he achieved his dream of becoming an NBA Champion. This documentary follows Serge on his journey home to the Republic of Congo, to show them the NBA Championship trophy but more importantly he shares a message that through hard work and determination, "Anything is Possible"!

programme.title: Saving Warru
programme.desc: Warru, or black-footed rock-wallaby, is one of South Australia's most endangered mammals. In 2007, when numbers dropped below 200 in the remote north-west of the State, the Warru Recovery Team was formed to help save the precious species from extinction. Bringing together contemporary science, practical on-ground threat management and traditional Anangu ecological knowledge, this unique decade-long program has recently celebrated the release of dozens of warru to the wild for the first time.

programme.title: The Lion Queen Episode 1 – A Midwife To Lions
programme.desc: Andi Rive, a midwife from the city has fallen in love with the fifty lions at Glen Garriff Lion Re-serve. With her dedicated team of staff, family and volunteers Andi is tasked with keeping the struggling reserve afloat, fending off creditors, lawyers and hunters.

programme.title: Redesign My Brain | Season 2 | Episode 1
programme.desc: In episode one, Help Me Adapt, Todd uses the latest science to train his brain to become more adaptable. To prove that it’s possible, he risks his life rock climbing blindfolded up a rock-face in Utah’s Moab Desert. He ascends the 120-metre corkscrew summit of the Ancient Art Tower, a feat never before attempted without sight, after only six weeks of training.

programme.title: Redesign My Brain | Season 2 | Episode 2
programme.desc: TV personality Todd Sampson puts brain plasticity to the test in Sharpen My Senses, as he radically improves his sensory perception and awareness. He hones his sight, hearing and touch and his heightened senses are put to the test in an incredible challenge - to crack a safe in under an hour, competing against the world’s best at a Master Locksmith’s Convention.

programme.title: Sonic Magic : The Wonder and Science of Sound
programme.desc: Sound has the power to charm, annoy, and even change history. Sonic Magic: The Wonder and Science of Sound reveals the historic force, promise, and potential of sound – and a strange phenomenon called cymatics that has created a new scientific mystery. Sonic Magic explores how sound has shaped our history, introducing us to fields of acoustic ecology and also research labs where sound is eliminating cancer tumours and much more.

programme.title: Eavesdrop
programme.desc: Ensemble drama about conversations overheard in a bistro: two chess players see unfolding dramas, a couple on an uncomfortable blind date, a crumbling marriage, and film-noir fans that think they're witnessing a real-life murder.

programme.title: Guardian of the Highlands
programme.desc: Sean Connery brings to life Sir Billi, a skateboarding veterinarian and number one grandpa. He channels the spirit of 007 James Bond to go above and beyond the call of duty and rescue a goat who thinks he's a dog, an admiral who's afraid of the water, and a beaver who was raised by rabbits. This heart-warming story is packed with enough stunts, skydiving, and car chases to keep the whole family on the edge of their seats.

programme.title: Lost and Found Cowboy: Lost and Found Cowboy Season 1
programme.desc: Yukata Cowboy, a Japanese-American street performer, helps foreigners in Tokyo. He guides Cindy, an American dancer, through Japans cultural maze she inspires him to learn to dance. They begin to perform together and become romantically involved, but one day, Cindy suddenly, disappears. Yukata Cowboy now has to travel around the world to find his soul-mate...

programme.title: Lost and Found Cowboy Season 2: Lost and Found Cowboy Season 2
programme.desc: Spring 2020, as Covid 19 spreads across the globe, the whole world is under lockdown. Alone in his house in Tokyo, Yukata Cowboy sinks into depression over his girlfriend Cindys sudden departure from their life together. Isolated by Covid and Cindys disappearance, he becomes despondent. One day, his friends Lotte, a budding comedian in London, and Maribel, a flamenco dancer in Madrid, reach out to him over the internet. Realizing the state he is in, they team up together to encourage him to perform comedy and to learn flamenco - online. Though initially resistant, Yukata Cowboy eventually performs comedy successfully with Lotte for a Zoom audience and dances flamenco with Maribel and Lotte. From across the globe, they celebrate their strong ties of friendship, and conquer the loneliness of quarantine.

programme.title: Sherlock Jr
programme.desc: A film projectionist longs to be a detective, and puts his meagre skills to work when he is framed by a rival for stealing his girlfriend's father's pocketwatch.

programme.title: Three Ages
programme.desc: The misadventures of Buster in three separate historical periods.

programme.desc: The simple-minded son of a rich financier must find his own way in the world.

programme.title: Evil
programme.desc: Creatures- STORY 1: A History of fearing "Beasties"- Dragons, Trolls, Gorgons, Werewolves. The mythology and the reality STORY 2: Vampires- those from books, those from legend, and those in jail right now. From Dracula and Bathory to Wiggington- you'll discover who is deadlier. STORY 3: Bigfoot, Yeti, Yowie, Sasquatch, they're all over the world but none are bigger or more real than Gigantopithecus. Join the Yowie Hunters of Australia and The Bigfoot Hunters of the US.

programme.title: Evil
programme.desc: The Evil in Cinema↵STORY 1:⇥Silent terror...The origins of evil cinema- the pioneering Germans ↵STORY 2:⇥the sound of evil... Deadly dialogue that gave horror images screams, gasps, growls and often took foreign accents to every corner of the globe↵STORY 3:⇥Scared to death... Why do like to be scared? Modern horror cinema has become a slash-fest trying the rekindle the horror and wonderment of the silent era.

programme.title: Night of the Living Dead
programme.desc: There is panic throughout the nation as the dead suddenly come back to life. The film follows a group of characters who barricade themselves in an old farmhouse in an attempt to remain safe from these bloodthirsty, flesh-eating monsters.

programme.title: On Location: Scary Movies
programme.desc: An inside look at where some of the scariest movies of all time were filmed.

programme.title: On Location: Horror Movies
programme.desc: A look at the actual filming locations from the best horror movies ever made!

programme.title: The World's Funniest Halloween Moments Hour
programme.desc: Join us for our special Halloween edition of funny pranks, viral videos, fun movies and John Ross' $1000 Challenge.

programme.title: A This Just In Halloween Special
programme.desc: This Just In "Halloween Special" When a mysterious culprit destroys the TJI school news set, the gang investigates. But when the power suddenly goes out on campus, the gang is terrified when one of them is missing. Their search leads them to the mysterious, forgotten catacombs deep beneath the school. World's Funniest Moments-Funny internet clips, home videos,The $1000 Challenge, and Viral Video Countdown

programme.title: Chiller 13: Great American Slashers
programme.desc: A countdown of the most memorable slashers ever to terrorize the big screen! with an array of commentary from comedians and horror icons like Robert Englund (A Nightmare on Elm Street) and Jamie Lee Curtis (Halloween), and Judah Friedlander (30 Rock)

And what does this mean for our democracy if we cannot grasp this important skill?

programme.title: The Tomb of the USSR
programme.desc: The Soviet invasion of Afghanistan triggered 10 years of a dirty conflict that changed the face of the world. Through exclusive archives of the Afghan guerilla and the testimony of the local Soviet former commander in chief, this film unveils the full story of a war which marked the beginning of the fall of the USSR.

programme.title: Fifth Gear

The Fifth Gear team test the Fiat 500X, a bigger version of Fiat's chic 500 model. It's meant to be a 'lifestyle' car, so the team attempt to discover what that means. And Tiff and Vicki visit Poland to sample some of the sights, sounds and car culture there.

programme.title: Mafia and Italy, a Bloody Pact
programme.desc: In 1992, the anti-Mafia magistrates Falcone and Borsellino were murdered in Palermo, the capital of Sicily. For a long time public opinion believed in a story of revenge that of Toto Riina who was head of Cosa Nostra, the fearsome Sicilian mafia. Now a lawsuit is challenging this hypothesis. Within the Italian state, someone is said to have guided the murders. With exclusive testimonies from judges, politicians and witnesses under protection, this film reveals several decades of incestuous links between the State and the mafia.

programme.title: The True Story of the Great Escape
programme.desc: Winter 1944. In Nazi Germany, 76 pilots - British, Canadians, Norwegians and French – who were held in a Luftwaffe prison camp, escaped. The tunnel used for their flight was built in the greatest secrecy, right under the nose of their German guards. This historical saga, immortalized in 1963 by John Sturges in his movie "The Great Escape" with Steve Mac Queen, went around the world. But the real story of these men overtakes by far the fiction imagined by Hollywood. Among the witnesses of this documentary, Jack Lyon, one of the last survivors of this adventure.

programme.title: The Legend of the Mustang

programme.title: Battle of Britain
programme.desc: This focuses on events from July to early Sept. 1940, where both sides were finding their feet. The Germans tried initially to bomb British naval shipping with limited success. Three separate attacks in August, targeting RAF airfields were successful - Biggin Hill, North Weald & Kenley were all put out of action - albeit temporarily. Then the Germans made a mistake that ultimately lost them the war.

programme.title: Don't Fade Away
programme.desc: Life was easy for Jackson White (RYAN KWANTEN). With looks, brains, and athletic ability, the possibilities seemed endless. But when he came to New York City to pursue a career in the music industry, he was so seduced by money and status that he lost track of who he was. Now, with both his personal and professional lives on the brink of disaster, he retreats home to care for his dying father (BEAU BRIDGES). While in North Carolina, he confronts the friends he lost track of and the girl he left behind (MISCHA BARTON).

programme.title: Secret Workshops
programme.desc: A job as a seamstress tempts Juana, a young Bolivian woman, to neighbouring Argentina. Her husband and child remain behind in their homeland. It doesn’t take long for the illusion of financial gain to burst – Juana is being exploited and must produce textiles for a luxury brand. Her employer’s demands become ever more absurd, working conditions become unbearable. When her son becomes ill, Juana starts making plans to return, but as far as her employer is concerned, leaving is not an option.

programme.title: Port Of Shadows
programme.desc: A military deserter finds love and trouble (and a small dog) in a smoky French port city.

programme.title: Variety Lights
programme.desc: A beautiful but ambitious young woman joins a traveling troupe of third-rate vaudevillians and inadvertently causes jealousy and emotional crises.

programme.title: Banjo Farid
programme.desc: Farid, 12 years old, is an enigma to others. Quiet and original, he seems to be experiencing daily life without feeling any emotion. However, one day, against all expectations, he will change thanks to an improbable musical instrument.

programme.title: Kansas City Confidential
programme.desc: An ex-con trying to go straight is framed for a million dollar armored car robbery and must go to Mexico in order to unmask the real culprits.

programme.title: The Terror
programme.desc: A young officer in Napoleon's army pursues a mysterious woman to the castle of an elderly Baron.

programme.title: Angelina Jolie
programme.desc: Skin Deep' is a touching story of a woman with conviction, who is making a meaningful mark on the world for the better of all. World renowned for her exotic looks and Oscar award winning movies, there is so much more to this A-list celebrity than meets the eye. ‘Skin Deep’ is a fascinating documentary which goes beyond the Hollywood hype and explores the incredible life of Angelina Jolie.

programme.title: For All Eternity
programme.desc: Fanny is training in Vienna when she meets Yunlong a Chines policeman. The two form an instant connection and against the wishes of everyone else in her life, Fanny moves to China to be with him. Soon afterward, however, the cultural revolution in China forces the two into hiding to escape persecution by the communists. Yunlong is eventually caught and imprisoned, leaving Fanny alone in a foreign land with no idea what it will take for her to survive.

programme.desc: Since her first major role in BMX Bandits, Nicole Kidman has come a long way. Capturing the hearts of audiences and major Hollywood stars alike, this beautiful, talented redhead has emerged from personal turmoil as an enduring, graceful icon of the silver screen and beyond.

programme.title: Inside Fighter
programme.desc: Pro boxer Frank Lo Porto dreams of becoming the first Italian/Australian world champion in fifty years, and when current undefeated champion Austin Trout offers him a chance to fight for the title at short notice, Frank jumps at the chance. Facing an uphill battle to be ready in time, Frank undertakes a gruelling training regime that tests his mental, physical and emotional boundaries. But Frank is destroyed in the fight and returns home a broken, shattered man.

programme.title: Girl Wired
programme.desc: A Preteen computer prodigy, Glory Vinci has invented an advance medical Ray Gun that can read peoples moods. She has been offered a scholarship to a prestigious Graduate Research Program but her guardian Grandfather is in gambling trouble with the mob, and when the nefarious gangsters discover that Gloria's device can read and steal anybody's credit card number they want to get their hands on it.

programme.title: West of Eden

programme.title: Cry of the Wild
programme.desc: This feature-length documentary from Bill Mason imparts his affection for the big northern timber wolves and the pure-white Arctic wolves. Filmed over three years in the Northwest Territories, British Columbia, the High Arctic and his home near the Gatineau Hills in Quebec, Mason sets out to dispel the myth of the bloodthirsty wolf. Going beyond the wolf's natural habitat, Mason relocated three young wolves to his own property and was able to film tribal customs, mating and birth. As a result, Cry of the Wild offers viewers access to moments in wildlife never before seen on film.

programme.title: Discovering: Herge
programme.desc: The first adventurer and journalist for children, Hergé is best known as the writer and illustrator of the comic books 'The Adventures of Tintin'. Despite controversy over his early work, his inspirational stories have stood the test of time.

programme.title: Bizarre: A Circus Story
programme.desc: 'Bizarre: A Circus Story' is a unique tale about passion, triumph and heartache. Part portraiture, it centers around Master Lu Yi, revered as the father of modern acrobatics. It follows his fascinating life story with all the victories, grief, and wisdom of a 75-year-old circus master. From his rise among the Communist Party as an acrobatic leader to his time as a prisoner during China's Cultural Revolution, Master Lu Yi's triumph to freedom is nothing short of a miracle. Known among his students as "Johnny Appleseed," he has been spreading his love and knowledge of the circus for over 50 years. Based at the Circus Center in the heart of San Francisco, he continues to build his legion of circus lovers. But it takes more than just talent and training to survive in the circus. It's grueling, competitive, and painful. 'Bizarre: A Circus Story' is also part performance based and features breathtaking performances by members of the circus community, from world-renowned performers to youth.

programme.title: The Chocolate Diet - A Scientific Hoax Goes Viral
programme.desc: Get slimmer by eating chocolate - how scientific studies will make us believe the stupidest things!

programme.title: Detour
programme.desc: While hitchhiking, New York pianist Tom Neal is offered a ride by a stranger who soon dies, leaving Tom with the car. As he continues on his journey, another hitchhiker becomes suspicious that Tom isn't who he says he is..

programme.title: Blood on the Sun
programme.desc: Nick Condon is a newspaper reporter working in Tokyo who refuses to toe the Japanese line on the expansionist policies of the anti-democratic Imperialist government. When it becomes clear to the authorities that Condon isn't going to cooperate and that he has some valuable information and contacts, they decide to get him in their clutches for some interrogations and then dispose of him.

programme.title: Bride to Be
programme.desc: What if pain was merely a set up for the ultimate surprise party? Genie Burns, owner of Surprise Enterprise, masterminds off the wall surprise parties in nobody would-suspect-it locations. Here she takes crazy risks but in her love life, she plays it safe. Her partner Steven, who hilariously calls her out on every issue she owns, is gay which makes him safe. Danny, her friend from college would be perfect for her but she keeps him in the friend zone. Along comes Jeff, everything she avoids, but his charm and depth draw her in. Is he the right one because he challenges her fears, or the wrong one because he implodes them? And why, she asks, are cereal boxes summoning her in the night! Meanwhile, Surprise Enterprise is hired by an anonymous Hollywood producer to throw a surprise wedding for his intended bride. Genie must get the bride down the aisle without knowing she's the bride. Her plan is to have him pretend he's filming a movie with a wedding at the end, giving his girlfriend a role. But as Genie plans the wedding, everything seems to go wrong, and her own life begins to take turns. In the end, what's real in life screams.... Surprise!

programme.title: The Burrowers
programme.desc: In the Wild West a family of settlers has vanished from their home under mysterious circumstances.

programme.title: Catacombs
programme.desc: An uptight girl gets lost in Paris' catacombs and is convinced she is being stalked by someone or something.

programme.title: The Gate
programme.desc: A mysterious hole in a suburban backyard leads a couple of boys to a chamber of terrifying demonic evil.

programme.title: Boo! A Madea Halloween
programme.desc: Madea spends her Halloween fending off killers, ghosts and zombies while keeping an eye on a group of teens.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Boo 2! A Madea Halloween
programme.desc: Madea and friends scare up big laughs on a hell-arious journey to rescue her niece from a haunted campground.

programme.title: Obsession
programme.desc: Sonia has to move from the Big Apple to Boston leaving her friends, family and her ex Tom. She meets Sebastian and one thing leads to another, and a flirtatious smile between them soon turns into a dinner date. However, the more they get to know each other, the more suspicious Sonia becomes. His curiosity about her life soon turns to an obsession. Sonia starts to feel trapped in her relationship. When Tom comes to Seattle, he makes a side trip to visit Sonia and she realizes how much she missed him. After Tom goes back to New York, someone breaks into Sonia’s home. But when she escapes to a friend’s isolated country home for a long weekend she is trapped!! ..Except... Sebastian wasn’t the one stalking her!! It was Tom, trying to scare Sonia into returning back home. Can Sebastian save her in time?

programme.title: Triple Dog
programme.desc: On the night of a sleepover, a group of teenage girls venture out in a competitive game of challenging dares. As the antics escalate, and the dares become more extreme, the girls unravel the truth behind a former student's rumored suicide.

programme.title: Wish You Were Dead
programme.desc: Hayley Udall tries to make ends meet for herself and her 14 year-old daughter while providing alimony for a horrible ex-husband. She wishes her problems with her ex could go away, and upon venting her frustrations one night, finds herself tangled up in a pact with two people (Melanie and Kevin) to “eliminate” each other’s problems.

programme.title: The Bad Son
programme.desc: An elusive serial killer is killing innocent women in Seattle. The police and FBI are on the killer's trail but were never prepared to face a bizarre twist in the case.

programme.title: Campus Caller
programme.desc: When a university student goes missing, her mother a former cop goes in search for her. What she encounters is a wall of academia bureaucracy and coverups that point to an abuse of authority stemming all the way to the government.

programme.desc: It’s surely our responsibility to do everything within our power to create a planet that provides a home not just for us, but for all life on Earth. People who are going to be around in 20 years’ time, will blame us profoundly if we don’t do anything about it.

programme.title: Gallowwalkers
programme.desc: A supernatural western following Aman, a mysterious gunman, the son of a nun cursed by God to be haunted by all those who die by his hand. When Aman kills a gang of murderers out of revenge, the crew rises from the dead to hunt him down. Andrew Goth’s ambitious and disaster beset feature (it started production is 2009) is a heady mix of Sergio Leone’s Spaghetti Westerns and Alejandro Jodorowsky’s mystical cult classic El Topo. Set in a vast foreboding desert, this ultimate cowboy zombie mash-up stars Wesley Snipes as a cursed gunfighter attempting to allude justice whilst killing the ‘undead’. Prepare for surreal true grit, a shock bonanza and a fistful of corpses.

programme.title: Guardians of the Tomb

programme.desc: Raindrop is a drop of water. You can find it in the forest, in the river, in the sea and even in your house. programme.desc: Adventures In Babysitting | A New Home | Holey Moley Munki and Trunk is a tree-crashing, rock-smashing, water-splashing, fruit-mashing knockabout comedy adventure! Munki (a bold, banana-juggling adventurer) and Trunk (a big-hearted and optimistic elephant) are best friends. They do everything together - swinging, stomping and somersaulting as they explore their jungle world, hatching plans, solving problems, having fun and helping friends along the way.

programme.title: Green Light - Season 1 - Episodes 13-16
programme.desc: Helping in the street | Don't throw rubbish out of the car | Closed doors | The train is coming How do you have to cross the street? How do you have to go by bicycle? programme.title: Boom & Reds - Season 1 - Episodes 1-6
programme.desc: From episode 1 to 6 The Reds are tiny creatures who are part of a community that lives together in a tree belonging to a fantastic world. The Reds love to gather and draw pictures and in each chapter, the ogre Boom has to guess what the Reds are drawing on the ground.

programme.title: Elsa and Fred
programme.desc: Two of Hollywood’s most dazzling stars light up the screen in this charming and captivating love story about finding true love. After losing his wife, Fred feels confused and alone, so his daughter, helps move him into a nearby apartment building where he meets Elsa. From that moment on, their lives are turned upside down as Elsa bursts into Fred’s life like a whirlwind, determined to teach him that time is precious and that he should enjoy life and love - to the fullest.

programme.title: 3 Hearts
programme.desc: One night in provincial France, Marc (Benoît Poelvoorde) meets Sylvie (Charlotte Gainsbourg) after missing his train back to Paris. Instantly and intensely drawn to one another, they wander through the streets until morning in rare, almost choreographed, harmony. A thwarted plan for a second meeting sends each in a separate direction - Sylvie reunites with her ex and leaves France Marc falls in love and marries. What neither knows is that Marc's new bride is Sylvie's sister, Sophie (Chiara Mastroianni).

programme.title: 5 to 7
programme.desc: An aspiring novelist enters into a relationship with a woman, though there's just one catch: She's married, and the couple can only meet between the hours of 5 and 7 each evening.

programme.title: What's Eating Gilbert Grape
programme.desc: Oscar nominated drama starring Johnny Depp and Leonardo DiCaprio. Gilbert feels trapped - with no father present and an eccentric family to care for, he is struggling to cope. His extremely overweight mother cannot leave the house and his younger brother with learning difficulties has a knack for finding trouble. Despite the hardships Gilbert perseveres, but will he be able to live his own life?

programme.title: Poppy Shakespeare
programme.desc: N has been a day patient at north London's Dorothy Fish day hospital for 13 years - her ambition is never to leave. Then she meets glamourous new patient Poppy Shakespeare, an ad agency receptionist convinced she's not mad.

programme.title: Mail Order Monster
programme.desc: After witnessing her mother's death 3 years ago, 12-year-old Sam Pepper has never been able to move on. With her reclusive nature and place at the 'nerd table', Sam is an easy target for bullying, even from her former friend PJ. One day, when PJ humiliates her in front of all their classmates, Sam decides she's finally had enough. Her imagination is sparked by an ad in a comic book, offering to deliver all the parts you need to build your own 'Monster'. Finally, Sam is able to give PJ a taste of her own medicine. But just as her life takes a turn for the better, Sam's father reveals he's proposed to his girlfriend.

programme.title: Adventurer: The Curse of the Midas Box
programme.desc: Seventeen-year-old Mariah Mundi’s life is turned upside down when his younger brother is kidnapped from the streets of Victorian London. Following a trail of clues to the darkly majestic Prince Regent Hotel, Mariah discovers a hidden realm of child-stealing monsters, sinister strangers, deadly secrets and a long-lost artifact that grants limitless wealth – but also devastating supernatural power. With the fate of his world, and his family at stake, Mariah will risk everything to unravel the Curse of the Midas Box!

programme.title: Battle for Skyark
programme.desc: In the near future the earth has become desolate and dangerous. Now inhabited by by a mysterious race of creatures, humanity has been forced to find refuge in the Skyark, a man-made city in the sky. As the population grows, space becomes scarce and only the rich and powerful can stay, dumping the poor and orphaned of Skyark to the abandoned earth. Among them is one boy, Rags, the son of a fallen commander who is determined to save his fellow orphans and exiles. Together with his friends, he must battle through the ruins of old earth, fighting off the horde of alien monsters to return to Skyark and bring peace back to the people.

programme.title: Barely Lethal
programme.desc: Megan Walsh is a teenage special ops agent who yearns for a normal adolescence. After faking her own death she assumes the role of an exchange student and quickly learns that surviving the treacherous waters of a typical American high school can be even more difficult than international espionage. Jam-packed with action from the cafeteria to the battleground, and with hilarious performances from Samuel L. Jackson, Jessica Alba and Sophie Turner, Barely Lethal is the unmissable action comedy that shows just how hard surviving high school really is!

programme.title: Jimmy P
programme.desc: A troubled Native American veteran forms an extraordinary friendship with his maverick French psychoanalyst as they try to find a cure to his suffering.

programme.title: Mortdecai
programme.desc: Juggling some angry Russians, the British Mi5, his impossibly leggy wife and an international terrorist, debonair art dealer and part time rogue Charlie Mortdecai (Johnny Depp) must traverse the globe armed only with his good looks and special charm in a race to recover a stolen painting rumored to contain the code to a lost bank account filled with Nazi gold.
